entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning then west 30 gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
